org.apache.beam.sdk.util

Class DoFnRunnerBase<InputT,OutputT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.util.DoFnRunnerBase<InputT,OutputT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoFnRunner<InputT,OutputT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleDoFnRunner

    public abstract class DoFnRunnerBase<InputT,OutputT>
extends Object
implements DoFnRunner<InputT,OutputT>
    A base implementation of DoFnRunner.

    Sub-classes should override invokeProcessElement(org.apache.beam.sdk.util.WindowedValue<InputT>).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DoFnRunnerBase.ListOutputManager
      An implementation of OutputManager using simple lists, for testing and in-memory contexts such as the DirectPipelineRunner.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected DoFn.ProcessContext createProcessContext(WindowedValue<InputT> elem)
      Returns a new DoFn.ProcessContext for the given element.
      void finishBundle()
      Calls DoFn.finishBundle(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.Context) and performs additional tasks, such as flushing in-memory states.
      protected abstract void invokeProcessElement(WindowedValue<InputT> elem)
      Invokes DoFn.processElement(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.ProcessContext) after certain pre-processings has been done in processElement(org.apache.beam.sdk.util.WindowedValue<InputT>).
      void processElement(WindowedValue<InputT> elem)
      Calls DoFn.processElement(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.ProcessContext) with a DoFn.ProcessContext containing the current element.
      void startBundle()
      Prepares and calls DoFn.startBundle(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.Context).
